class convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.svm.nlu.SVMNLU(config_file='C:\Users\jincli\Desktop\ConvLab\convlab\modules\nlu\multiwoz\svm\config/multiwoz.cfg', model_file=None)[source]¶

Bases: convlab.modules.nlu.nlu.NLU

parse(utterance, context=None, not_empty=True)[source]¶

Predict the dialog act of a natural language utterance and apply error model. :param utterance: The user input, a natural language utterance. :type utterance: str

Returns:The parsed dialog act of the input NL utterance.
Return type:output (dict)
